Detailed Description

Parsing file of the acquisition series.

This class parses and stores the list of foreground-background pairs (read ::Desc for more details).

Definition at line 101 of file experiment.h.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef std::pair< Path, int > AqSeries::fgelement [private]

Element of the foregrounds array: the foreground itself and the index of the corresponding background.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AqSeries::AqSeries ( const Path &  filename)

Constructs from file.

Parses input file.

Parses input file as it is described in AqSeries and constructs the foreground and background arrays.

Parameters:
filenameFile with the foreground-background pairs.

void AqSeries::projection ( int  idx,
Map &  proj,
const std::vector< int > &  sliceV = std::vector<int>() 
) const

Constructs one cleaned projection of the experimental data.

Constructs the flat-field subtracted projection from the experimental data at given rotation position ::itheta and puts it into ::proj array.

Parameters:
idxrotation position.
projthe array to put data into.
sliceVarray of slices to be extracted.
